title.narrative: International Growth Centre - Development and Implementation

description.narrative: This activity (International Growth Centre - Development and Implementation) is a component of International Growth Centre (IGC) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £28,822,414. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, London School of Economics and Political Science. The start date is 01-07-2008 and the end date is 31-03-2013.

participating-org.narrative: London School of Economics and Political Science

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
